item.title: Re: Stacking Item bonus / improve range
item.content:encoded:
1) Could it be that the bonus of items don't stack with each other ( eg 1+ Levels from soul GLove) ?

Nope. They totally stack with each other.

2) What options do i have to improve my range? (strength as well) I don't get it how i can manage to take on B rank missions when i am not capable of increasing my range?

Allies, Jutsu, Summons, and items are the way you improve just about anything. If you're lacking in range, try adding more range allies or looking up range increasing teams on this wiki. Also getting to Jonin will give you +2 range in the stats you didn't increase by getting to Sp. Jonin.

PS: is there something like a Turorial, where I can look up stuff like that?^^

I'm afraid not. The three day quest is designed to teach you the bare basics of the system, but since you're trying B-Ranks, I'm assuming you're well past that. Still, there is the wiki, and also a Quick Q&A section on the official forum. People tend to be fairly polite and nice when answering questions there.
